briefTitle: A Study of Tirzepatide (LY3298176) in Participants With Type 2 Diabetes on Metformin With or Without Sulfonylurea (SURPASS-AP-Combo)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Phase 3, Open-label Trial Comparing the Effect of Tirzepatide Once Weekly Versus Titrated Insulin Glargine on Glycemic Control in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes on Metformin With or Without a Sulfonylurea
summary: The main reason for this study is to compare the study drug tirzepatide to insulin glargine in participants with type 2 diabetes on metformin with or without a sulfonylurea.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline in Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) (10 mg and 15 mg)
